jump_scares.spoiler: Someone appears beside the driver’s side window of the car
There is some very loud banging on the door
Further loud banging on the door startles Amy
The lights briefly turn on and a masked figure can be seen at the window
A masked face appears at the bathroom window
After a short pause, the banging on the door resumes again
The phone booth is lit up by a car’s lights
The motel manager comes up beside the truck driver
There is a loud bang as a man attempts to enter the room through a door in the floor
As the police officer lowers the bonnet, a masked man can be seen standing behind him
David opens the motel door and is immediately attacked by a masked man
The motel manager grabs Amy around the neck
